tools.name: open_browser
tools.description: Opens a website URL in the user's browser. Use this when the user asks to open a website, view a page, or navigate to a URL. Examples: 'open google', 'show me youtube', 'navigate to github.com'
tools.parameters: { "type": "object", "properties": { "url": { "type": "string", "description": "The full URL to open, including https:// protocol. If user doesn't specify protocol, add https://" } }, "required": ["url"] }
tools.fallback_content: I'm sorry, I couldn't open that website. Please try again or provide a different URL.
tools.version_description: Opens URLs in user's browser window

tools.name: open_translator
tools.description: Opens the translation app in the user's browser. Use this when the user needs to translate text or asks for translation help. Can optionally specify source and target languages.
tools.parameters: { "type": "object", "properties": { "language_from": { "type": "string", "description": "Source language code (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr'). Optional, defaults to auto-detect" }, "language_to": { "type": "string", "description": "Target language code (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr'). Optional" } } }
tools.fallback_content: I'm sorry, I couldn't open the translator. Please try again.
tools.version_description: Opens translation app with optional language parameters

tools.name: translate_text
tools.description: Helps users with text translation by suggesting the translation app. Use this when the user asks to translate text, needs translation help, or wants to know what something means in another language.
tools.parameters: { "type": "object", "properties": { "text": { "type": "string", "description": "The text to translate" }, "target_language": { "type": "string", "description": "Target language code (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr', 'de')" }, "source_language": { "type": "string", "description": "Source language code (optional, defaults to auto-detect)" } }, "required": ["text", "target_language"] }
tools.fallback_content: I can help you with translation! Let me open our translation app for you.
tools.version_description: Translation helper that suggests the web app

tools.name: send_whatsapp
tools.description: Sends a WhatsApp message to a phone number using Green API. Use this when the user asks to send a WhatsApp message, text someone on WhatsApp, or message a contact. The phone number must be in international format without the + symbol.
tools.parameters: { "type": "object", "properties": { "phoneNumber": { "type": "string", "description": "Phone number in international format without + symbol. Examples: 79876543210 (Russia), 14155551234 (USA), 447700900123 (UK). Remove all spaces, dashes, and special characters." }, "message": { "type": "string", "description": "The message text to send via WhatsApp. Can include emojis and formatting." } }, "required": ["phoneNumber", "message"] }
tools.fallback_content: I'm sorry, I couldn't send that WhatsApp message. Please check the phone number format and try again. The number should be in international format without the + symbol.
tools.version_description: Sends WhatsApp messages via Green API integration

tools.name: send_email_summary
tools.description: Sends a conversation summary email to the user. Use this when the user asks to email them a summary, send them a recap, or wants to receive their conversation history via email.
tools.parameters: { "type": "object", "properties": { "email": { "type": "string", "description": "User's email address where the summary will be sent" }, "user_name": { "type": "string", "description": "User's name for personalization (optional)" } }, "required": ["email"] }
tools.fallback_content: I'm sorry, I couldn't send the email summary. Please check the email address and try again.
tools.version_description: Sends conversation summary via Resend email service
